project_descr: The purpose of this project is to initiate activities to support enhancement of the public administration in Turkmenistan at both policy and institutional levels.

outputs.output_descr: The project is to support the Government of Turkmenistan in improving the legal framework for civil service and institutional development of the Civil Service Academy to carry out successful programmes of teaching and training of civil servants.

document_name: Annual Work Plan Civil Service project 2010
AWP Monitoring Tool Report Civil Service 2011
Final Review Report Civil Service project 2011
project_title: enhancing the system of civil service in turkmenistan
